data.title: Iceland’s Finance Chief Aims to Bar Purchase by Landsbankinn
data.meta_description: Iceland’s finance minister said she will try to prevent state-owned lender Landsbankinn hf’s purchase of an insurance company as it contradicts government policy.
data.text:
Iceland’s finance minister said she will try to prevent state-owned lender Landsbankinn hf’s purchase of an insurance company as it contradicts government policy.

Thordis Kolbrun Reykfjord Gylfadottir said in a Facebook post Sunday evening she won’t approve the bank’s 28.6 billion kronur ($210 million) offer for TM tryggingar hf announcedBloomberg Terminal earlier that day, “unless a sales process for Landsbankinn will be launched concurrently.”
